course_title: Acute and Chronic Care II: Adult and Geriatric Populations
class_notes: This section is for Distance ABSN semester 2 students only. Online with synchronous sessions via Zoom.
course_description: This course is part two in a series of courses focused on adult and geriatric populations. Students will compare, contrast, and examine commonly occurring acute and chronic conditions using clinical reasoning and knowledge from prior courses.
sections: Class Nbr: 1552, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: TTh 11:30a-1:30p, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
